item.title: Help me plz!
item.dc:creator: @dyde08 dyde08
item.description:
@dyde08 wrote:

[quote=“bigh51, post:2, topic:221226”]POSTING IN ALL CAPITAL LETTERS MAKES PEOPLE ANSWER FASTER!!!

here is an example of a command.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noobcodergtfo") {
              addItem(0995, 10000);
              sendMessage("noob coders get 10k because they cant code and post in all caps");
}

addItem adds the item id 0995 which is money and the ammount of that item id 10000.
sendMessage sends a message to the player telling them they cant code and post in all caps. hey, that sounds kinda like you.[/quote]

lmfao,almost cried reading that code…

Read full topic

item.title: Help me plz!
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

In client.java, press CTRL & F and search for:

("yell")

That should look something like this:

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5) {

Above that, add this:

if (command.startsWith("pkeroutfit")) { addItem(5698, 1); }

Save, compile and run.

When you do ::pkeroutfit now you will recieve a DDS.
Add another ‘addItem(####);’ to the command, to recieve more items, and replace the ‘####’ with the ID of the item you wish to recieve when you do ::pkeroutfit.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me plz!

@bigh51 wrote:

POSTING IN ALL CAPITAL LETTERS MAKES PEOPLE ANSWER FASTER!!!

here is an example of a command.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noobcodergtfo") {
              addItem(0995, 10000);
              sendMessage("noob coders get 10k because they cant code and post in all caps");
}

addItem adds the item id 0995 which is money and the ammount of that item id 10000.
sendMessage sends a message to the player telling them they cant code and post in all caps. hey, that sounds kinda like you.

also you add the command under the custom command void.
